definitions.explanation_en: A proper noun, typically used as a feminine given name, derived from the name Max or as a variant of Maximilian or Maximilla, often associated with strength and elegance.
definitions.explanation_cn: 一个专有名词，通常用作女性名字，源自 Max 或 Maximilian/Maximilla 的变体，常与力量和优雅相关联。
definitions.example_en: Maxine is a talented pianist who performs internationally.
definitions.example_cn: 马克辛是一位才华横溢的钢琴家，经常在国际上演出。
